analysis.description:
SharderToken (/unique_chucks/30/0x996ccd50d1e3aee157dac4ee79942ab63ad86ebc.sol#85-408) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/30/0x996ccd50d1e3aee157dac4ee79942ab63ad86ebc.sol#228-230)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x996ccd50d1e3aee157dac4ee79942ab63ad86ebc.sol:
	Contract SharderToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x996ccd50d1e3aee157dac4ee79942ab63ad86ebc.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
SharderToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x996ccd50d1e3aee157dac4ee79942ab63ad86ebc.sol#89-90)
